content: knit 1 st per st or per row work rib edge in the round as follows rounds 1-6 k1 p1 rounds 7-9 * k1 slip 1 stitch purlwise with the yarn held in front * repeat from * to * to end of round rounds 10-14 k1 p1 folded collar bind off fold the collar towards the inside *with the ln pick up a st on the 1rst row of the collar where sts were picked up slip it to ln k2tog the 1rst st on ln with the picked up st k1 bobble 1 st* repeat from * to * to the end each picked up stitch is only from purl stitches in the inside knitted together with each knit stitch from the ln please see this great video https //www youtube com/watch v=kjx3_c1ah10&ab_channel=ashleylillis weave in all ends enjoy 6 tricodo © copyright 2025 abbreviations co = cast on st s = stitch es k = knit p = purl k2tog = knit 2 stiches together p2tog = purl two stitches together sl = slip pw = purlwise sl2pwyif = slip 2 stiches purlwise with yarn in front rs = right side of your work ws = wrong side of your work rn = right needle ln = left needle st s = stitch es round s = round s m = marker rm = remove marker bor = beginning of the row/round bobble = bind off remm = removable marker bef = before patt = pattern *-* = repeat increases kfb = knit in front & back loop from a same stitch m1r insert left needle under the strand that runs between the stitches from back to front then knit this strand m1l insert left needle under the strand that runs between the stitches from front to back then knit this strand through the back loop german short row ds = double stitch slip purlwise the next stitch with yarn in front bring the yarn over the right needle to the back and pull on the slipped stitch until it looks like a double stitch two legs at the following row just above knit or purl the double stitches when you reach them so knit or purl both legs together 7 tricodo © copyright 2025 measurements a = finished bust circumf 90-98-106-112 cm / 35½-38½-41¾-44 inches b = shoulder width 38-38-40 5-40 5 cm / 15-15-15¾-15¾ inches c = height of the armholes opening 25-26-27-28 cm / 9¾-10¼-10½-11 inches d = height of the body adaptable 26 cm / 10¼ inches in the sample e = height of the slope about 10 cm / 4 inches 8 tricodo © copyright 2025
